patthana11.1:2.1: Nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naabyākato nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. patthana11.1:8.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi vitthāro.)
